FixViolationLineageProcessBox: Fix LineageSection flow diagram to show transaction name/type (e.g. 'Washing & Processing (TX-PROD-987)') instead of just the transaction ID. Requires backend to return originating transaction description/type, and LineageSection to display it in the process box. Also add a separate 'Lineage' h2 heading above the card (matching BatchOverview pattern) instead of using 'Lineage' as the card title inside section-card-header.
